entry.title: Fourier Transform Report
entry.summary: This was an assignment where we had to detail an application of complex numbers. I spent around three days trying to find a great application and landed on the fourier transform from signal analysis videos! The report also includes a wonderful, real world analysis example where a time series is broken into individual sine waves.

entry.title: Neural Networks Textbook
entry.summary: This was an assignment where we had to design a textbook chapter on an application of matrices. I chose neural networks!
